summary: most of the original dark brotherhood members return after being killed by the imperial legion.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]*complete the dark brotherhood quest before installing this mod*
this mod brings the following members and creatures to the dawnstar sanctuary 
[/size][list]
[*][size=5]arnbjorn[/size]
[*][size=5]festus krex[/size]
[*][size=5]gabriella [/size]
[*][size=5]lis (the spider)[/size]
[*][size=5]veezara[/size]
[*][size=5]astrid( if not in the sanctuary is wondering outside but returns frequently )[/size]
[/list]
author: dan love
